resources.string: java is a high-level programming language originally developed by Sun Microsystems and released in 1995. Java runs on a variety of platforms, such as Windows, Mac OS, and the various versions of UNIX
1.Java works on different platforms (Windows, Mac, Linux, Raspberry Pi, etc.)
2.It is one of the most popular programming language in the world)
3.It is easy to learn and simple to use
You learned from the previous chapter that you can use the println() method to output values or print text in Java:
Comments can be used to explain Java code, and to make it more readable. It can also be used to prevent execution when testing alternative code.
